en:
Glory and majesty are before Him;
strength and joy are in His place.

“Ascribe to the LORD, O families of the peoples,
ascribe to the LORD glory and strength.

Ascribe to the LORD the glory of His name,
bring tribute and enter before Him,
bow down to the LORD majestic in holiness.

Tremble in His presence, all the earth!
The world stands firm; it cannot be shaken.

Let the heavens rejoice and the earth exult;
let them declare among the nations, “The LORD is King!”

Let the sea and all within it thunder,
the fields and everything in them exult;

then shall all the trees of the forest shout for joy
at the presence of the LORD,
for He is coming to rule the earth.

Praise the LORD for He is good;
His steadfast love is eternal.

fCf. Ps. 106.47–48.Declare:
Deliver us, O God, our deliverer,
and gather us and save us from the nations,
to acclaim Your holy name,
to glory in Your praise.
Blessed is the L<small>ORD</small>, God of Israel, from eternity to eternity.” And all the people said, “Amen” and “Praise the L<small>ORD</small>.”<sup>-f</sup>
he: ה֤וֹד וְהָדָר֙ לְפָנָ֔יו {ס}         עֹ֥ז וְחֶדְוָ֖ה בִּמְקֹמֽוֹ׃
הָב֤וּ לַֽיהֹוָה֙ מִשְׁפְּח֣וֹת עַמִּ֔ים {ס}         הָב֥וּ לַיהֹוָ֖ה כָּב֥וֹד וָעֹֽז׃
הָב֥וּ לַֽיהֹוָ֖ה כְּב֣וֹד שְׁמ֑וֹ {ס}         שְׂא֤וּ מִנְחָה֙ וּבֹ֣אוּ לְפָנָ֔יו הִשְׁתַּחֲו֥וּ לַֽיהֹוָ֖ה בְּהַדְרַת־קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ {ס}
חִ֤ילוּ מִלְּפָנָיו֙ כׇּל־הָאָ֔רֶץ אַף־תִּכּ֥וֹן תֵּבֵ֖ל בַּל־תִּמּֽוֹט׃ {ס}
יִשְׂמְח֤וּ הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ וְתָגֵ֣ל הָאָ֔רֶץ וְיֹאמְר֥וּ בַגּוֹיִ֖ם יְהֹוָ֥ה מָלָֽךְ׃ {ס}
יִרְעַ֤ם הַיָּם֙ וּמְלוֹא֔וֹ יַעֲלֹ֥ץ הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה וְכׇל־אֲשֶׁר־בּֽוֹ׃ {ס}
אָ֥ז יְרַנְּנ֖וּ עֲצֵ֣י הַיָּ֑עַר מִלִּפְנֵ֣י יְהֹוָ֔ה כִּי־בָ֖א לִשְׁפּ֥וֹט אֶת־הָאָֽרֶץ׃ {ס}
הוֹד֤וּ לַֽיהֹוָה֙ כִּ֣י ט֔וֹב כִּ֥י לְעוֹלָ֖ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ {ס}
וְאִמְר֕וּ הוֹשִׁיעֵ֙נוּ֙ אֱלֹהֵ֣י יִשְׁעֵ֔נוּ וְקַבְּצֵ֥נוּ וְהַצִּילֵ֖נוּ מִן־הַגּוֹיִ֑ם {ס}         לְהֹדוֹת֙ לְשֵׁ֣ם קׇדְשֶׁ֔ךָ לְהִשְׁתַּבֵּ֖חַ בִּתְהִלָּתֶֽךָ׃ {ס}
בָּר֤וּךְ יְהֹוָה֙ אֱלֹהֵ֣י יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל מִן־הָעוֹלָ֖ם וְעַ֣ד הָעֹלָ֑ם וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ כׇל־הָעָם֙ אָמֵ֔ן {ס}         וְהַלֵּ֖ל לַיהֹוָֽה׃ {פ}

en:
cWith vv. 8–22, cf. Ps. 105.1–15.“Praise the LORD;
call on His name;
proclaim His deeds among the peoples.

Sing praises unto Him;
speak of all His wondrous acts.

Exult in His holy name;
let all who seek the LORD rejoice.

Turn to the LORD, to His might;dI.e., the Ark; cf. Pss. 78.61; 132.8.
seek His presence constantly.

Remember the wonders He has done;
His portents and the judgments He has pronounced,

O offspring of Israel, His servant,
O descendants of Jacob, His chosen ones.

He is the LORD our God;
His judgments are throughout the earth.

Be ever mindful of His covenant,
the promise He gave for a thousand generations,

that He made with Abraham,
swore to Isaac,

and confirmed in a decree for Jacob,
for Israel, as an eternal covenant,

saying,‘To you I will give the land of Canaan
as your allotted heritage.’

You were then few in number,
a handful, merely sojourning there,

wandering from nation to nation,
from one kingdom to another.

He allowed no one to oppress them;
He reproved kings on their account,

‘Do not touch My anointed ones;
do not harm My prophets.’

eWith vv. 23–33, cf. Ps. 96.1–13.“Sing to the LORD, all the earth.
proclaim His victory day after day.

Tell of His glory among the nations,
His wondrous deeds among all peoples.

For the LORD is great and much acclaimed,
He is held in awe by all divine beings.

All the gods of the peoples are mere idols,
but the LORD made the heavens.
he: הוֹד֤וּ לַֽיהֹוָה֙ קִרְא֣וּ בִשְׁמ֔וֹ {ס}         הוֹדִ֥יעוּ בָעַמִּ֖ים עֲלִילֹתָֽיו׃
שִׁ֤ירוּ לוֹ֙ זַמְּרוּ־ל֔וֹ {ס}         שִׂ֖יחוּ בְּכׇל־נִפְלְאֹתָֽיו׃
הִֽתְהַלְלוּ֙ בְּשֵׁ֣ם קׇדְשׁ֔וֹ {ס}         יִשְׂמַ֕ח לֵ֖ב מְבַקְשֵׁ֥י יְהֹוָֽה׃
דִּרְשׁ֤וּ יְהֹוָה֙ וְעֻזּ֔וֹ {ס}         בַּקְּשׁ֥וּ פָנָ֖יו תָּמִֽיד׃
זִכְר֗וּ נִפְלְאֹתָיו֙ אֲשֶׁ֣ר עָשָׂ֔ה {ס}         מֹפְתָ֖יו וּמִשְׁפְּטֵי־פִֽיהוּ׃
זֶ֚רַע יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל עַבְדּ֔וֹ {ס}         בְּנֵ֥י יַעֲקֹ֖ב בְּחִירָֽיו׃
ה֚וּא יְהֹוָ֣ה אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ {ס}         בְּכׇל־הָאָ֖רֶץ מִשְׁפָּטָֽיו׃
זִכְר֤וּ לְעוֹלָם֙ בְּרִית֔וֹ {ס}         דָּבָ֥ר צִוָּ֖ה לְאֶ֥לֶף דּֽוֹר׃
אֲשֶׁ֤ר כָּרַת֙ אֶת־אַבְרָהָ֔ם {ס}         וּשְׁבוּעָת֖וֹ לְיִצְחָֽק׃
וַיַּעֲמִידֶ֤הָ לְיַֽעֲקֹב֙ לְחֹ֔ק {ס}         לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל בְּרִ֥ית עוֹלָֽם׃
לֵאמֹ֗ר לְךָ֙ אֶתֵּ֣ן אֶֽרֶץ־כְּנָ֔עַן {ס}         חֶ֖בֶל נַחֲלַתְכֶֽם׃
בִּהְיֽוֹתְכֶם֙ מְתֵ֣י מִסְפָּ֔ר {ס}         כִּמְעַ֖ט וְגָרִ֥ים בָּֽהּ׃
וַיִּֽתְהַלְּכוּ֙ מִגּ֣וֹי אֶל־גּ֔וֹי {ס}         וּמִמַּמְלָכָ֖ה אֶל־עַ֥ם אַחֵֽר׃
לֹֽא־הִנִּ֤יחַ לְאִישׁ֙ לְעׇשְׁקָ֔ם {ס}         וַיּ֥וֹכַח עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם מְלָכִֽים׃
אַֽל־תִּגְּעוּ֙ בִּמְשִׁיחָ֔י {ס}         וּבִנְבִיאַ֖י אַל־תָּרֵֽעוּ׃ {פ}
שִׁ֤ירוּ לַֽיהֹוָה֙ כׇּל־הָאָ֔רֶץ {ס}         בַּשְּׂר֥וּ מִיּֽוֹם־אֶל־י֖וֹם יְשׁוּעָתֽוֹ׃
סַפְּר֤וּ בַגּוֹיִם֙ אֶת־כְּבוֹד֔וֹ {ס}         בְּכׇל־הָעַמִּ֖ים נִפְלְאֹתָֽיו׃
כִּי֩ גָד֨וֹל יְהֹוָ֤ה וּמְהֻלָּל֙ מְאֹ֔ד {ס}         וְנוֹרָ֥א ה֖וּא עַל־כׇּל־אֱלֹהִֽים׃
כִּ֠י כׇּל־אֱלֹהֵ֤י הָֽעַמִּים֙ אֱלִילִ֔ים {ס}         וַיהֹוָ֖ה שָׁמַ֥יִם עָשָֽׂה׃

Psalms 13:6.en:
But I trust in Your faithfulness,
my heart will exult in Your deliverance.
I will sing to the LORD,
for He has been good to me.
Psalms 13:6.he: וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ בְּחַסְדְּךָ֣ בָטַחְתִּי֮ יָ֤גֵ֥ל לִבִּ֗י בִּֽישׁוּעָ֫תֶ֥ךָ אָשִׁ֥ירָה לַֽיהֹוָ֑ה כִּ֖י גָמַ֣ל עָלָֽי׃ {פ}

Psalms 144:15.en:
Happy the people who have it so;
happy the people whose God is the LORD.
Psalms 144:15.he: אַשְׁרֵ֣י הָ֭עָם שֶׁכָּ֣כָה לּ֑וֹ אַֽשְׁרֵ֥י הָ֝עָ֗ם שֱׁיְהֹוָ֥ה אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ {פ}

Psalms 20:10.en:
cOr in the light of v. 7, “O Lord, grant victory to the king; may He answer us when we call.”O LORD, grant victory!
May the King answer us when we call.-c

Psalms 25:6.en:
O LORD, be mindful of Your compassion
and Your faithfulness;
they are old as time.
Psalms 25:6.he: זְכֹר־רַחֲמֶ֣יךָ יְ֭הֹוָה וַחֲסָדֶ֑יךָ כִּ֖י מֵעוֹלָ֣ם הֵֽמָּה׃

Psalms 28:9.en:
Deliver and bless Your very own people;
tend them and sustain them forever.
Psalms 28:9.he: הוֹשִׁ֤יעָה ׀ אֶת־עַמֶּ֗ךָ וּבָרֵ֥ךְ אֶת־נַחֲלָתֶ֑ךָ וּֽרְעֵ֥ם וְ֝נַשְּׂאֵ֗ם עַד־הָעוֹלָֽם׃ {פ}

en:
We set our hope on the LORD,
He is our help and shield;

in Him our hearts rejoice,
for in His holy name we trust.

May we enjoy, O LORD, Your faithful care,
as we have put our hope in You.
he: נַ֭פְשֵׁנוּ חִכְּתָ֣ה לַֽיהֹוָ֑ה עֶזְרֵ֖נוּ וּמָגִנֵּ֣נוּ הֽוּא׃
כִּי־ב֭וֹ יִשְׂמַ֣ח לִבֵּ֑נוּ כִּ֤י בְשֵׁ֖ם קׇדְשׁ֣וֹ בָטָֽחְנוּ׃
יְהִי־חַסְדְּךָ֣ יְהֹוָ֣ה עָלֵ֑ינוּ כַּ֝אֲשֶׁ֗ר יִחַ֥לְנוּ לָֽךְ׃ {פ}

Psalms 3:9.en:
Deliverance is the LORD’s;
Your blessing be upon Your people! Selah.

Psalms 40:12.en:
O LORD, You will not withhold from me Your compassion;
Your steadfast love will protect me always.
Psalms 40:12.he: אַתָּ֤ה יְהֹוָ֗ה לֹֽא־תִכְלָ֣א רַחֲמֶ֣יךָ מִמֶּ֑נִּי חַסְדְּךָ֥ וַ֝אֲמִתְּךָ֗ תָּמִ֥יד יִצְּרֽוּנִי׃

Psalms 44:27.en:
Arise and help us,
redeem us, as befits Your faithfulness.
Psalms 44:27.he: ק֭וּמָֽה עֶזְרָ֣תָה לָּ֑נוּ וּ֝פְדֵ֗נוּ לְמַ֣עַן חַסְדֶּֽךָ׃ {פ}

Psalms 46:8.en:
The LORD of hosts is with us;
the God of Jacob is our haven. Selah.
Psalms 46:8.he: יְהֹוָ֣ה צְבָא֣וֹת עִמָּ֑נוּ מִשְׂגָּֽב־לָ֨נוּ אֱלֹהֵ֖י יַֽעֲקֹ֣ב סֶֽלָה׃

en:
Ascribe might to God,
whose majesty is over Israel,
whose might is in the skies.

You are awesome, O God, in Your holy places;
it is the God of Israel who gives might and power to the people.
Blessed is God.
he: תְּנ֥וּ עֹ֗ז לֵאלֹ֫הִ֥ים עַֽל־יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל גַּאֲוָת֑וֹ וְ֝עֻזּ֗וֹ בַּשְּׁחָקִֽים׃
נ֤וֹרָ֥א אֱלֹהִ֗ים מִֽמִּקְדָּ֫שֶׁ֥יךָ אֵ֤ל יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל ה֤וּא נֹתֵ֨ן ׀ עֹ֖ז וְתַעֲצֻמ֥וֹת לָעָ֗ם בָּר֥וּךְ אֱלֹהִֽים׃ {פ}

Psalms 78:38.en:
But He, being merciful, forgave iniquity
and would not destroy;
He restrained His wrath time and again
and did not give full vent to His fury;
Psalms 78:38.he: וְה֤וּא רַח֨וּם ׀ יְכַפֵּ֥ר עָוֺן֮ וְֽלֹא־יַֽ֫שְׁחִ֥ית וְ֭הִרְבָּה לְהָשִׁ֣יב אַפּ֑וֹ וְלֹא־יָ֝עִ֗יר כׇּל־חֲמָתֽוֹ׃

Psalms 81:11.en:
I the LORD am your God
who brought you out of the land of Egypt;
open your mouth wide and I will fill it.
Psalms 81:11.he: אָֽנֹכִ֨י ׀ יְ֘הֹוָ֤ה אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ הַֽ֭מַּעַלְךָ מֵאֶ֣רֶץ מִצְרָ֑יִם הַרְחֶב־פִּ֝֗יךָ וַאֲמַלְאֵֽהוּ׃

Psalms 84:13.en:
O LORD of hosts,
happy is the man who trusts in You.
Psalms 84:13.he: יְהֹוָ֥ה צְבָא֑וֹת אַֽשְׁרֵ֥י אָ֝דָ֗ם בֹּטֵ֥חַ בָּֽךְ׃ {פ}

Psalms 85:8.en:
Show us, O LORD, Your faithfulness;
grant us Your deliverance.

en:
God of retribution, LORD,
God of retribution, appear!

Rise up, judge of the earth,
give the arrogant their deserts!
he: אֵל־נְקָמ֥וֹת יְהֹוָ֑ה אֵ֖ל נְקָמ֣וֹת הוֹפִֽיעַ׃
הִ֭נָּשֵׂא שֹׁפֵ֣ט הָאָ֑רֶץ הָשֵׁ֥ב גְּ֝מ֗וּל עַל־גֵּאִֽים׃

Psalms 99:5.en:
Exalt the LORD our God
and bow down to His footstool;
He is holy!
Psalms 99:5.he: רוֹמְמ֡וּ יְ֘הֹוָ֤ה אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ וְֽ֭הִשְׁתַּחֲווּ לַהֲדֹ֥ם רַגְלָ֗יו קָד֥וֹשׁ הֽוּא׃

Psalms 99:9.en:
Exalt the LORD our God,
and bow toward His holy hill,
for the LORD our God is holy.
Psalms 99:9.he: רוֹמְמ֡וּ יְ֘הֹוָ֤ה אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ וְֽ֭הִשְׁתַּחֲווּ לְהַ֣ר קׇדְשׁ֑וֹ כִּי־קָ֝ד֗וֹשׁ יְהֹוָ֥ה אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ {פ}
